title: Prompting Medical Large Vision-Language Models to Diagnose Pathologies by Visual Question Answering
details: D Guo, D Terzopoulos - arXiv preprint arXiv:2407.21368, 2024
abstract: Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) have achieved significant success in recent years, and they have been extended to the medical domain. Although demonstrating satisfactory performance on medical Visual Question Answering (VQA) tasks …
